091-63a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo

126
091-63b yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig /yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma/ gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i ba'abyung po 'bum

127

128
091-64b thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ / dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur / /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/ sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyam pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de di ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed chag bde legs

129
091-65a shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khor/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs bas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis

130

091-66b gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / / tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / / lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog/ /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ / 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /
